summary: "The Chosen" is an American TV series about Jesus and his followers in the 1st century. It's the first multi-season series on Jesus' life. The show stars Jonathan Roumie as Jesus and was created by Dallas Jenkins. It's mainly filmed in Texas and Utah. The series is free on its app, funded by viewers and streaming platforms. It's very popular, with over 100 million viewers, and has won several awards. Some people have criticized it for artistic freedom and religious portrayals, but most responses are positive. It's also been adapted into novels, graphic novels, and Bible study materials.
title: The Chosen (TV series)
